data.sampled: P + O2 = P2O5 is not a chemical equation, it is a chemical formula. A chemical equation involves chemical reactions and includes the coefficients of the reactants and products. In order to balance a chemical equation, the number of atoms of each element on both sides of the equation must be equal.
